ygData.subject: Research and components
ygData.msgSnippet: As i understand until now: Wizards use Runes, Magicians use Words, Elemental Grimoir Enchanters use Pages, Necromancers use Words and Runes? Im interested if
ygData.messageBody:
As i understand until now:

Wizards use Runes,

Magicians use Words, Elemental Grimoir

Enchanters use Pages,

Necromancers use Words and Runes?



Im interested if anyone have gained skill by doing research and what was a
minimum skill what you have when you first time researched a spell?

- For lv 20 spell magician. NO NEED FOR PEN AND PARCHMENT. Just the three
components listed in the book then combine.


Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)


http://www.tip.it/wizard

moderator
